channel.title: Reconnaissance on Khoshrozeh
channel.description: Recent content in Reconnaissance on Khoshrozeh

item.title: Recon Tactics and Tools with TomNomNom
item.description: Introduction In this post I’m going to go over some reconnaissance tools, most of them built by well known and respected hacker TomNomNom, or Tom Hudson. I’m also going to cover some of his methodologies and techinques, for example how he utilizes VIM in his recon. You can find and install his tools from his github. I’m going to demonstrate some of these tactics on Admiral Labs which currently has a bug bounty on HackerOne.
